metadata.title: DPM Dar emphasizes hosting SCO CHS in befitting manner

content.article_body: ISLAMABAD, Oct 2 (APP):Deputy Prime Minister / Foreign Minister (DPM/FM), Senator Muhammad Ishaq Dar on Thursday, chairing a meeting of the high-level Committee following up the preparations for Pakistan's Chairmanship of SCO Council of Heads of States (CHS), guided the planning process and emphasized the importance of hosting the SCO CHS 2026-27 in a befitting manner. The meeting was held at the Ministry of Foreign Affairs and attended by SAPM Tariq Bajwa, Acting Foreign Secretary, Secretaries from Cabinet Division, Interior, Information, Chairman CDA, IG ICT and other senior officials, a DPM's Office news release said.
